tool_description: Retrieves comprehensive species lists for specific geographic regions, filtered by season and habitat type for targeted foraging identification.

region_code.description: Geographic region identifier from GPS extraction

season.description: Current season: spring, summer, autumn, winter

habitat_types.description: Habitat types to include in search

include_rare_species.description: Whether to include rare or protected species

error_messages: Unknown region: Region code not found in database, check GPS coordinates
Invalid season: Use spring, summer, autumn, or winter only
Invalid habitat type: Use recognized habitat types like forest, grassland, wetland, alpine, desert
Invalid elevation range: Minimum elevation must be less than maximum elevation
usage: Provide region_code and season to get relevant species list. Filter by habitat_types and elevation ranges for more specific results. Toggle include_fungi and include_rare_species as needed.
